detail_desc: Cargo trousers in sturdy, patterned cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short blouse in airy chiffon with a square neckline at the front, covered buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined.
Short blouse in airy chiffon with a square neckline at the front, covered buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined.
Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Jumpsuit in ribbed cotton jersey with an open back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
